The language in which display the applic: The language in which display the application.

Author: Author
The url that will open first when openin: The url that will open first when opening a new window.
The search engine that will be used when: The search engine that will be used when entering text in the url input and pressing enter.
The size of opening new windows when the: The size of opening new windows when they are not maximized.
If checked, BonBon will not save your br: If checked, BonBon will not save your browsing history. It will also desactivate URL suggestions.
Pressing CTRL and T at the same time wil: Pressing CTRL and T at the same time will open a new webpage (named Tab in other browsers).
Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and T at the same t: Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and T at the same time will reopen a last closed webpage (named Tab in other browsers).
Pressing CTRL and R at the same time wil: Pressing CTRL and R at the same time will reload the current focused webpage (named Tab in other browsers).
Pressing CTRL and W at the same time wil: Pressing CTRL and W at the same time will close the current focused webpage (named Tab in other browsers). If no webpage are open in the collection (upper tabulation), then the collection will be closed.
Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and W at the same t: Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and W at the same time will close the current collection (upper tabulation).
Pressing CTRL and TAB at the same time w: Pressing CTRL and TAB at the same time will focus the next webpage (named Tab in other browsers).
Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and TAB at the same: Pressing CTRL, SHIFT and TAB at the same time will focus the next collection (upper tabulation).
Pressing ALT and Scrolling at the same t: Pressing ALT and Scrolling at the same time will scroll into the document without stopping hover the webpages.
Use the size of the last closed webpage: Use the size of the last closed webpage
